mapper.select: SELECT product_code, category_code, name, content, price, stock, rdate FROM product

SELECT product_code, category_code, name, content, price, stock, rdate FROM ( SELECT product_code, category_code, name, content, price, stock, rdate, rownum rn FROM product WHERE rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
SELECT product_code, category_code, name, content, price, stock, rdate FROM product ORDER BY product_code DESC
SELECT product_code, category_code, name, content, price, stock, rdate FROM product ORDER BY price
SELECT product_code, category_code, name, content, price, stock, rdate FROM product ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_code, category_code, name, content, price, stock, rdate FROM product WHERE category_code = #{categoryCode} ORDER BY product_code DESC
SELECT product_code, category_code, name, content, price, stock, rdate FROM product WHERE category_code = #{categoryCode} ORDER BY price
SELECT product_code, category_code, name, content, price, stock, rdate FROM product WHERE category_code = #{categoryCode} ORDER BY price DESC
